titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that all employers give veterans a holiday on Veteran's Day in honor of their service to our country.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary:
2/7/2008--Introduced.
Urges all employers to give veterans a holiday in honor of their service and so they may participate in Veterans Day ceremonies.
